mapper.insert: INSERT into student_task (student_id, task_id, score, record_time) VALUES (#{studentId}, #{taskId}, #{score}, #{recordTime})
mapper.select: SELECT t.id, t.record_time, t.score, (SELECT name FROM student WHERE id = t.student_id) AS studentName, (SELECT c.name FROM task AS t1 JOIN course AS c ON t1.course_id = c.id WHERE t1.id = t.task_id) AS taskName FROM student_task AS t
